titleInfo.title: Gospel Sing Featuring the Happy Goodman Family at Waycross Memorial Stadium (18865)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color half-sheet (red and black on green) announcing the World's Largest Annual Sun-Down to Sun-Up Gospel Sing featuring the Happy Goodman Family, the Blackwood Brothers, the Hemphills, Sonny Simmons and the Action Singers, Jerry and the Singing Goffs, and Willie Wynn and the Tennesseans at Waycross Memorial Stadium on August 27. Poster features metal photoplates of the Happy Goodman Family, the Blackwood Brothers, Jerry and the Singing Goffs, and Willie Wynn and the Tennesseans. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/47631/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
